user_profile.name: Omar Al-Farsi
user_profile.description: Omar is a 22-year-old Middle Eastern man with a passion for problem-solving and efficiency. As an active and detail-oriented individual, he is currently seeking to book a nurse for his father, balancing urgency with a preference for thoroughness. His analytical nature allows him to navigate through the challenges of the task while being adaptable to the social pressures and high demands of his mobile environment.

task_profile.task: book a nurse for my father

instructions.dialogue: Express only basic needs, let the assistant ask questions.
instructions.profile: Gradually reveal your profile information throughout the conversation.
instructions.hidden_state: Express moderate emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

priority_features: Ability to communicate in both Arabic and English
usage_scenarios: Daily home visits for medication management
Assistance with personal hygiene and mobility
